SEARCH
Package ie.atu.sw.menu

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.menu.Menu
Direct Known Subclasses:
SettingsMenu, SimplifierMainMenu
public abstract class Menu extends Object
Abstract class that represents a menu in an application. This class is responsible for displaying the menu options, accepting user input, and executing the associated actions for selected options. It supports a shortcut-based system for selecting menu items.

    Constructs a new Menu with the given title, input reader, and menu printer.

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu(String title, InputReaderInterface inputReader, MenuPrinterInterface menuPrinter)
      Constructs a new Menu with the given title, input reader, and menu printer. Initializes the menu items by calling createMenuItems().
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the menu to be displayed
      inputReader - an InputReaderInterface used to read user input
      menuPrinter - an MenuPrinterInterface used to print the menu and options

  • Method Details

    • getTitle

      protected String getTitle()
      Returns the title of the menu.
      Returns:
      the title of the menu

    • getMenuPrinter

      protected MenuPrinterInterface getMenuPrinter()
      Returns the MenuPrinterInterface used to print the menu and options.
      Returns:
      the menu printer instance

    • getInputReader

      protected InputReaderInterface getInputReader()
      Returns the InputReaderInterface used to read user input.
      Returns:
      the input reader instance

    • addMenuItem

      protected void addMenuItem(String shortcut, String label, Runnable runnable)
      Adds a menu item to the menu using a shortcut key, label, and an associated action (runnable).
      Parameters:
      shortcut - the shortcut key for the menu item
      label - the label to display for the menu item
      runnable - the action to execute when the menu item is selected

    • addMenuItem

      protected void addMenuItem(MenuItem item)
      Adds a menu item to the menu.
      Parameters:
      item - the MenuItem to be added

    • addMenuItemList

      protected void addMenuItemList(List<MenuItem> itemList)
      Adds a list of menu items to the menu.
      Parameters:
      itemList - the list of MenuItems to be added

    • scanInputOptionAndRunItemRunnable

      protected void scanInputOptionAndRunItemRunnable()
      Reads the user's input for a menu option and executes the corresponding menu item's action (if available). If the input is invalid or an error occurs during execution, an error message is printed.

    • printMenuAndAcceptChoice

      public void printMenuAndAcceptChoice()
      Displays the menu title, menu items, and prompts the user to make a selection. After a selection is made, the corresponding action is executed.

    • createMenuItems

      protected abstract void createMenuItems()
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to define the menu items. This method is called during the construction of the menu to populate it with items.
